    Tarantulas rumbles closer to Aracnia, then, suddenly, Paralysis punches 
the spider while Aerostreak leaps in front of his Commander, wepon drawn.
    "Who's the grape face?" Paralysis craoked as he drew his wepon. He looked 
at the fallen tarantula.
    "Im Tarantulas, and your a dead bot walking!" He hissed. Suddenly, his 
shoulders arched and four cluster missles collided with Paralysis, sending 
him into peices.
    Aerostreak began to fire, but the spider anticipated the attack and shot 
the pistol out of his hand. Then netted him in a techno-web.
    "Well, that settles that. Aracnia, its been a pleasure." He hissed and 
headed out into the corridor and saw Quickstrike running towrds him.
    "Stop fuzor! Leave me be or I shall destroy Aracnia!" He said, pointing 
his gun at the unconscience Black Aracnia. But, in the shadows, Paralysis 
crawled over to Aerostreak nad released him before going into stasis. 
Aerostreak hoped Quickstrike would distract the spider so he could nab him.
